ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // {Aeris}
This place is scary in a lot of ways.
Especially for a girl.
So we've got to find {Tifa} fast.

ops.raw: 09 00 00 00 3d ff ba fe 00 3d ff ba fe 00 10

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Aeris}
What is it?
Are you going outside like that?
I mean, that's okay with me, but

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // Get a hold of yourself,
Ms. {Cloud}.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // It's a weird world we live in,
so eat up and work hard.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // According to that guy with the tank,
if you're strong enough,
anyone can make it to the top plate.{PAUSE}So, build your strength by having
a plate of our food.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Please come in.
There's a free 'Pharmacy Coupon'
if you enter now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // Hey, you two.
Why don't you get some rest?{PAUSE}We have a beautiful room,
how 'bout it?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // Hey, y'all.
Please stay here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // Hey, you two.
Why don't you get some rest?{PAUSE}We have a beautiful room,
how 'bout it?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // Hey, y'all.
Please stay here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // Hey, y'all.
Please stay here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // Hey, y'all.
Please stay here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // Seems like everything
has frills on it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // Oh what should I do?
Should I just buy it?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // What?
Are you ladies going to eat, too?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // I don't know what's gonna happen next.
But first, you gotta fill your stomach.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // Phew, it's all dusty
ever since the sky came down.
I'll have to start over.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // It's a little early to start eating.
Come back in a bit.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // Hey! Pretty lady.
Let me tell you about a good job!{PAUSE}Go to the Don's place.
You'll make a small fortune!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:14}); // We're not leavin' this city
no matter what happens.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // I never believed that Sector 7
would ever come down.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:11}); // Hey boy! You sure got a
good-lookin' heifer there!{PAUSE}Take her to the Don's place,
and you'll make a mint.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // I just can't make up my mind
Mmm.{PAUSE}Huh? About what?{PAUSE}Hmmm, don't make me say it
It's the shop down on the right.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // Nope, I just can't make up my mind.
Here, you take this.
You won't be able to get in without it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // Received Key Item
"Member's Card"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // Say, you're a cutie,
heh, heh, heh.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // I wish I could live
with a real cat.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:21}); // It came down from the sky.{PAUSE}But the old guy who likes tanks took
all of it away.
I wanted some, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // Aren't cats great?
This one's a little big, huh?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

dialogStrings: Wall Market

{Aeris}
This place is scary in a lot of ways.
Especially for a girl.
So we've got to find {Tifa} fast.

Please come in.
There's a free 'Pharmacy Coupon'
if you enter now.
Please, stop by.

According to that guy with the tank,
if you're strong enough,
anyone can make it to the top plate.{PAUSE}So, build your strength by having
a plate of our food.

It's a weird world we live in,
so eat up and work hard.

I just can't make up my mind
Mmm.{PAUSE}Huh? About what?{PAUSE}Hmmm, don't make me say it
It's the shop down on the right.

Nope, I just can't make up my mind.
Here, you take this.
You won't be able to get in without it.

Received Key Item
"Member's Card"!

Say, you're a cutie,
heh, heh, heh.

Hey boy! You sure got a
good-lookin' heifer there!{PAUSE}Take her to the Don's place,
and you'll make a mint.

Hey! Pretty lady.
Let me tell you about a good job!{PAUSE}Go to the Don's place.
You'll make a small fortune!

I never believed that Sector 7
would ever come down.

We're not leavin' this city
no matter what happens.

Hey, you two.
Why don't you get some rest?{PAUSE}We have a beautiful room,
how 'bout it?

Hey, y'all.
Please stay here!

Oh what should I do?
Should I just buy it?
That was scary

Seems like everything
has frills on it.

Aren't cats great?
This one's a little big, huh?

It came down from the sky.{PAUSE}But the old guy who likes tanks took
all of it away.
I wanted some, too.

I wish I could live
with a real cat.

It's a little early to start eating.
Come back in a bit.

What?
Are you ladies going to eat, too?

Phew, it's all dusty
ever since the sky came down.
I'll have to start over.

I don't know what's gonna happen next.
But first, you gotta fill your stomach.

{Cloud}
What's wrong, {Aeris}?

{Aeris}
What is it?
Are you going outside like that?
I mean, that's okay with me, but

{Cloud}
Oh, yeah.

Get a hold of yourself,
Ms. {Cloud}.

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
